FuncDef:
The mask feature-name command enables a device to filter out an alarm for a specific service.
The undo mask feature-name command disables a device from filtering out an alarm for a specific service.
By default, alarms are not masked.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a feature. The feature must exist.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can create an alarm filtering table and run the mask feature-name command to define the alarms that users are not concerned about in this table, preventing these alarms from being reported.
Prerequisites
The alarm filtering table exists.
Configuration Impact
The mask feature-name command can be repeatedly run to filter out multiple alarms.
